jump_scares.spoiler: The girl turns around and a figure in a cape stands behind her
When the girl closes the door, a figure in a cape appears behind her
After Helena comes out of the room, the camera zooms in and the cape-wearing figure appears from the room and grabs her. Very similar to the jump scare in Exorcist 3, but not at all effective
Riley is suddenly grabbed by Professor Gelson as she looks in the window
When the girl turns on the light, a man in a mask is next to her
When Riley says “Oh my” suddenly an arrow flies past her
Kris sneaks through the kitchen. On the table you can already see a man standing with a cape. When he jumps down, a loud noise is heard
Suddenly someone bangs on the car window as Kris stands in front of the house
